TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LoginDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CompositeControlDesigner

summary.span: 在可视化设计器中为 Web 服务器控件提供设计时支持。

span.span: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the Web-server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件显示允许用户在登录到承载网站的用户界面。The control displays a user interface that allows a user to log on to the host Web site. 在可视化设计器中，当从源视图切换到设计视图中，标记源代码描述控件进行分析，并在设计图面上创建控件的设计时版本。In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes the control is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface. 当你切换回源视图时，设计时控件的标记源代码持久保存，并编辑向网页上的标记。When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to the markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page. 类提供设计时支持控件。The class provides design-time support for the control. 类属性提供了以下功能：The class properties provide the following functionality: - 属性返回对象，它通常包含一个对象，派生自的继承树中的每个级别的设计器类。The property returns a object, which typically contains an object that is derived from the class for each level in the inheritance tree of the designer. - 属性返回的格式设置以在中显示的方案集合**自动套用格式**对话框。The property returns a collection of formatting schemes for display in the **Auto Format** dialog box. - 属性返回的字段的关联的模板组集合控制和顶级模板。The property returns a collection of template groups for the fields of the associated control and the top-level template. - 属性始终返回`true`，，该值指示设计器将创建关联的临时副本来生成设计时标记。The property always returns `true`, indicating that the designer creates a temporary copy of the associated to generate the design-time markup. 类方法提供以下功能：The class methods provide the following functionality: - 方法返回用于呈现关联的标记在设计时。The method returns the markup that is used to render the associated at design time. - 方法返回的模板关联的序列化的副本。The method returns a serialized copy of the template for the associated . - 方法提供了用于呈现关联的标记在设计时时出现错误。The method provides the markup that is used to render the associated at design time when an error has occurred. - 方法准备设计器，以查看、 编辑和设计关联。The method prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated . - 方法用于移除属性、 添加其他属性，或者隐藏关联的属性。The method is used to remove properties from, add additional properties to, or shadow properties of the associated . - 方法会设置关联的区域从控件模板的序列化副本。The method sets a region of the associated from a serialized copy of a control template. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何扩展类更改派生自的控件的外观控件在设计时。The following code example shows how to extend the class to change the appearance of controls that are derived from the control at design time. 该示例从`MyLogin`控件从。The example derives the `MyLogin` control from the . `MyLogin`是一份控件。The `MyLogin` is a copy of the control. 该示例还从`MyLoginDesigner`类，并将应用属性，则为`MyLoginDesigner`上`MyLogin`控件。The example also derives the `MyLoginDesigner` class from the and applies a attribute for the `MyLoginDesigner` on the `MyLogin` control. `MyLoginDesigner`重写方法来执行属性显示在**属性**网格在设计时。The `MyLoginDesigner` overrides the method to make the property visible in the **Properties** grid at design time. 它将重写方法来绘制控件以使其范围更明显，周围的蓝色的虚线边框，如果属性`MyLogin`控件是或值。It overrides the method to draw a blue, dashed border around the control to make its extent more visible, if the property of the `MyLogin` control is the or value. 它将重写方法来生成标记为包含错误消息以红色、 粗体文本呈现的占位符。It overrides the method to generate the markup for a placeholder that includes the error message rendered in red, bold text. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner/CS/LoginDesigner.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner/VB/LoginDesigner.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 内部构造的新实例类时创建关联控件或该控件的设计图面上的副本。The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the class when it creates the associated control or a copy of that control on the design surface.

span.span: if the control allows resizing; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性设置为`false`，该控件不允许重设大小。If the property is set to `false`, the control does not allow resizing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象填充从 XML 编码的内部类的成员。The object is populated from an XML-encoded member of an internal class.

param.name: regions

summary.span: 获取用于在设计时呈现关联控件的标记，并填充设计器区域的集合。

span.span: Gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time and populates a collection of designer regions.

returns.span: 一个字符串，其中包含用于在设计时呈现 的标记。

span.span: A string containing the markup used to render the at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法创建对象属性关联的控件并将其添加到被引用的对象`regions`参数。The method creates an object for the property of the associated control and adds it to the object that is referenced by the `regions` parameter. 方法使用基方法来生成用于在设计时呈现标记控件。The method uses the base method to generate the markup for the design-time rendering of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写继承自的类方法类，以更改派生自的控件的外观控件在设计时。The following code example shows how to override the method in a class that is inherited from the class to change the appearance of a control that is derived from the control at design time. 该示例将绘制蓝色的虚线边框的控件，以使其范围更明显，如果的控件的属性是或值。The example draws a blue, dashed border around the control to make its extent more visible, if the property of the control is the or value. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner/CS/LoginDesigner.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner/VB/LoginDesigner.vb#4)]

para.span: 如果你重写方法，一定要调用基方法它最终，经过多级重写，因为调用上控件或控件来生成标记的副本。

span.span: If you override the method, be sure to call the base method because it eventually, through several override levels, calls on the control or a copy of the control to generate the markup.

summary.span: 返回用于在设计时呈现关联控件的当前模板的序列化副本。

returns.span: 一个字符串，其中包含用于在设计时呈现关联 的模板的序列化副本。

span.span: A string containing a serialized copy of the template used to render the associated at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法会创建一份对象关联的控件容器中的控件并返回序列化的副本。The method creates a copy of the object of the associated control in the control container and returns a serialized copy. 序列化的模板可以还原到的一部分控制使用方法。The serialized template can be restored to a part of the control using the method. `region`不使用参数。The `region` parameter is not used by the .

span.span: A string that contains the markup used to render the associated at design time after an error has occurred.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 占位符的设计时控件呈现包含的类型名称、 控件名称和公告和描述错误的消息。The placeholder that the design-time control renders contains the type name, the control name, and messages announcing and describing the error. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写继承自的类方法类，以更改派生自的控件的外观控件在设计时。The following code example shows how to override the method in a class that is inherited from the class to change the appearance of a control that is derived from the control at design time. 该示例为一个占位符，包括错误消息以红色、 粗体文本呈现生成标记。The example generates the markup for a placeholder that includes the error message rendered in red, bold text. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner/CS/LoginDesigner.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner/VB/LoginDesigner.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Initialize(class System.ComponentModel.IComponent component) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Initialize (component As IComponent)

span.span: A , that implements an .

summary.span: 准备设计器，以查看、编辑和设计关联的组件。

span.span: Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在可视化设计器调用方法准备设计器用于呈现时控件。The visual designer calls the method when it is ready to use the designer to render the control. 方法后其基方法配置属性，并设置所需的设计器操作的事件。The method and its base methods configure properties and set up events that are necessary for the operation of the designer. `component`参数是与此设计器或一份相关联的控件控件。The `component` parameter is the control that is associated with this designer or a copy of the control.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void PreFilterProperties(class System.Collections.IDictionary properties) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub PreFilterProperties (properties As IDictionary)

param.name: properties
param.span: 实现添加的和隐藏的属性的 的集合。

span.span: A collection implementing the of the added and shadowed properties.

summary.span: 供设计器使用，以从“属性”网格的显示中移除属性或向其添加其他属性或者隐藏关联控件的属性。

span.span: Used by the designer to remove properties from or add additional properties to the display in the **Properties** grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件设计器使用派生自的方法方法隐藏各种控件属性，用相应的设计时属性设计器实现，并将添加到属性或删除属性从**属性**网格。Control designers use methods that are derived from the method to shadow various control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, and to add properties to or remove properties from the **Properties** grid. 如果属性已定义的控件，设置时到模板化，不应用的属性的属性`false`中未显示这些属性以便**属性**网格。If a property has been defined for the control, the sets the attribute of properties that do not apply when templated to `false` so those properties do not appear in the **Properties** grid. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建派生自的类，并重写方法可以更改**属性**网格控件在设计时。The following code sample creates a class derived from , and overrides the method to change the **Properties** grid of a control at design time. 示例使属性显示在**属性**网格。The example makes the property visible in the **Properties** grid. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner/CS/LoginDesigner.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner/VB/LoginDesigner.vb#3)]

para.span: 重写方法可以将属性添加到或更改的设计时属性集合中的属性的属性。

span.span: Override the method to add properties to or change attributes of properties in the design-time property collection.

para.span: 请确保在执行其他处理之前调用基方法。

span.span: Be sure to call the base method before performing other processing.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool RenderOuterTable { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定 控件是否使用外部表容器来应用内联 CSS 样式规则。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the control uses an outer table container to apply inline CSS style rules.

value.span: 如果该控件使用外部表容器来应用内联 CSS 样式规则，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the control uses an outer table container to apply inline CSS style rules; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件使用的外部表容器来应用标记中的内联样式规则。The control uses an outer table container to apply inline style rule in the markup. 你可以通过将此属性设置为删除外部表容器`true`。You can remove the outer table container by setting this property to `true`. 删除外部表，可更好的灵活性，你可如何将 CSS 规则应用于由控件呈现的标记。Removing the outer table gives you greater flexibility in how you apply CSS rules to the markup that is rendered by the control.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void SetEditableDesignerRegionContent (System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion region, string content);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void SetEditableDesignerRegionContent(class System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion region, string content) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub SetEditableDesignerRegionContent (region As EditableDesignerRegion, content As String)
public: override void SetEditableDesignerRegionContent(System::Web::UI::Design::EditableDesignerRegion ^ region, System::String ^ content);

param.name: region
param.span: 一个 ，提供要更新的区域的名称。

span.span: An that provides the name of the region to update.

param.name: content
param.span: 一个字符串，其中包含关联控件的序列化模板。

span.span: A string that contains a serialized template for the associated control.

summary.span: 根据控件模板的序列化副本设置关联控件的一个区域。

span.span: Sets a region of the associated control from a serialized copy of a control template.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法分析的关联的序列化的模板由指定的控件`content`参数，然后使用模板来更新由指定的控件的区域和属性`region`参数。The method parses a serialized template for the associated control that is specified by the `content` parameter, and then uses the template to update the region of the control that is specified by the property of the `region` parameter. 属性可以使用序列化控件方法。The property of the control can be serialized using the method.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property TemplateGroups As TemplateGroupCollection

summary.span: 获取用于关联控件字段的模板组集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of template groups for the fields of the associated control.

value.span: 一个 ，其中为 中的每个模板化字段包含一个元素。

span.span: A containing an element for each templated field in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可以获取对象基类的属性，并将对象，它包含单个对象关联的布局模板到控件.The property gets a object from the base property, and then adds a object that contains a single object for the layout template of the associated control to the . 属性返回这给调用方。The property returns this to the caller.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property UsePreviewControl As Boolean
protected: virtual property bool UsePreviewControl { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示设计器是否应使用临时副本取代与设计器关联的实际控件来生成设计时标记。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the designer should use a temporary copy rather than the actual control associated with the designer to generate the design-time markup.
Always .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因为属性始终是`true`，设计器属性返回的关联副本控件来生成设计时标记。Because the property is always `true`, the designer property returns a copy of the associated control to generate the design-time markup. 属性通过保存的实际创建副本控件，然后再分析的持久化的控制字符串。The property creates the copy by persisting the actual control, then parsing the persisted control string. 复制的控件不会影响任何持久性。The copied control does not affect any persistence for the . 如果属性已被重写以返回`false`，该设计器使用关联自身来生成设计时标记，并对控件的设计时更改将保存到页标记源。If the property has been overridden to return `false`, the designer uses the associated itself to generate the design-time markup, and design-time changes to the control will persist to the page markup source.

para.span: 您可以重写属性以返回或者想要确定基于是否使用类级别标记控件了其值属性。

span.span: You can override the property to return or to determine its value based on whether the control is marked with a class-level attribute.

para.span: 如果不重写，控件将忽略。

span.span: If the is not overridden, the control ignores the .
